roleset.name: not as much as

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: I go to therapy -LRB- for other reasons also -RRB- and they have encouraged me to pick a number of times to check , obviously that-1 [*-1] is less than 20 , and to stick to it and cut down that way .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, more.01.

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: Although it is less of a problem during the day it does not feel normal during the day .

roleset.name: Akin to "not": I'm less than impressed!

role.descr: Comment that is NOT quite true of Arg1

example.name: All args
example.text: Now , with the various " Occupy " movements , it is -LRB- or ought to be -RRB- obvious that a great many people are less than enchanted with capitalism and its expression in the idustrial democracies , as well as in the countries into which capitalists from the industrial democracies go to invest .
example.arg: than enchanted with capitalism and its expression in the idustrial democracies , as well as in the countries into which capitalists from the industrial democracies go to invest .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
